      • selectOption

        default void selectOption​(java.lang.String pickerChoice,
                          java.lang.Integer timeout)
                   throws NoSuchPickerChoiceException
        Choose a single value from a drop-down or picker.
        Parameters:
        pickerChoice - value of the picker to select.
        timeout - timeout (in seconds) for picker-related actions.
        Throws:
        NoSuchPickerChoiceException - when no matching picker options were found for the requested choice.

      • selectOption

        default void selectOption​(java.lang.String pickerChoice,
                          java.lang.String expectedFieldValue,
                          java.lang.Integer timeout)
                   throws NoSuchPickerChoiceException
        Choose a single value from a drop-down or picker. Use this in cases where the picker value is transformed before showing in the text field.
        Parameters:
        pickerChoice - value of the picker to select.
        expectedFieldValue - value used to make sure that the picker choices were made correctly.
        timeout - timeout (in seconds) for picker-related actions.
        Throws:
        NoSuchPickerChoiceException - when no matching picker options were found for the requested choice.
